comments:
The attached report design runs with the 2006-6-13 build of BIRT. However it fails to run with 2006-06-16 and later nightly builds. When you preview the report design in BIRT report designer the following exception is shown:

The following items have errors:

Data (id = 84):
- There are errors evaluating script "row["dbo_OFFICES:CITY"]".

This preview result is expected according to attached report design file. In 2.0.1, there is one property under data set named resultSet, which is replaced by resultSetHints property in 2.1 and this change is done recently. resultSet property is used to adapt the metadata of data set between BIRT model and DTP model. So model API users needs to know this change.

I have attached a report design file which can run correctly, and the change is to rename the property of resultSet to resultSetHints.

Another solution is to keep the resultSet property as before, and use another property to adapt the model between BIRT and DTP.

Created an attachment (id=44787)
updated report design file
Canceled. The attached report design is invalid since the design-time column name (in ResultSet structure) does not match the name provided at runtime.
